pages.name: Hint #8
pages.text: Tick by tick, a creature's guise, awaits a touch to synchronize. With time in hand and knowledge earned, its hidden magic can be turned.$(br)$(br)See the next page for the answer.

pages.title: Answer #8
pages.text: Click on a Forest Clock with a clock item while having at least one enchanting level. Then craft a Time Density Manifest.

pages.title: Answer #8
pages.text: The forest clock spawns in forests near midnight.$(br)
